name: Suika's drunk runaway
description:
An RPG Maker Touhou game 

Suika broke into a house to steal alcohol while trying to dodge ghosts

Mash Z and X to look through the cupboard for alcohol
Be careful some are trapped and will slow you down

Game made during the Touhou Game Jam 9, in 3 days.

Made by Youli
Twitter: @poyouli
Instagram: youli_owo

Music by Clémancipé
Twitter: @clémancipé_
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvQZbQiLQSbhHDM_pEBVJDw

death sound effect : team shangjai Alice
